item.title: OpenSUSE 13.1 + Mate 1.6 + Xmonad
item.author: gonzih@gmail.com (Max Gonzih)
item.description: So OpenSUSE 13.1 was released. And it’s great. But… Since gnome 3.9 support for custom window managers was broken. How to restore sanity to your desktop? Mate it! Here is quick how to.

item.title: Programmer Dvorak and switching workspaces in XMonad
item.author: gonzih@gmail.com (Max Gonzih)
item.description: Recently I migarted from awesome to xmonad. I’m Programmer Dvorak freak, so I stuck with controlling current workspace from numbers row.
